product_details.name: Gabba Goods Wireless Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones with Microphone - Wireless Headset -Noise Reduction - Bluetooth, Wired,Built in Micro SD for Travel, Home, Work TV,PC,Gaming,Cellphone (Lavender)
product_details.description: Noise Control: Sound Isolation. Headphones Jack: 3.5 mm Jack. Model Name: Platinum Vibe. Connectivity Technology: Wireless. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth. Compatible Devices: Laptops, Desktops, Tablets, Telephones, Smartphones, MP3/4 Players, Computers, MacBook, Bluetooth Devices. Number of Items: 1. Audio Driver Type: Dynamic Driver. Earpiece Shape: over_ear. Package Dimensions: 9.13 x 7.13 x 3.9 inches. Item Weight: 12 ounces. Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern tech product layout, ideal for promoting headphones. It adopts a clean and symmetrical grid design divided into four main pastel-toned quadrants in purple hues, overlaid with subtle diagonal white lines and gradient circles for depth. The left side highlights the brand name (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) and product category (`subheading`) in bold white typography. Below that, a list of key features (`description`) is aligned left in dark purple text. The right focal point is a hyperrealistic product image (`product_image`). At the bottom left, the price (`price`) is prominently displayed above a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`).

**Color Palette**:
- Lavender (#A495C9)
- Light Purple (#B9A6D8)
- Deep Purple (#4A245E)
- Soft Lilac (#C9A4D4)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a modern pair of over-ear headphones dominated by soft, stylish lavender and purple hues. The primary color is a glossy pastel lavender (#C7A7D3), which covers the ear cups and headband, giving it a premium, sleek feel. The ear pads use a slightly deeper purplish tone (#9B78AC), adding a balanced contrast while blending seamlessly into the main body. Accents such as the buttons and trim areas incorporate a soft lilac shade (#DCC5E9), enhancing visual interest. This cohesive yet contrasting palette makes the headphones visually appealing. A complementary ad banner can use these three main colors with white (#FFFFFF) for text.
